00005  *  This is the unit test for the "Customer" class.
00006  */
00007 
00008 #include "tcustomer.h"
00009 
00010 QString gId      = QString ("AX1111");    /**< Customer ID value (test data). */
00011 QString gSurname = QString ("Malkovich"); /**< Customer surname value (test data). */
00012 QString gName    = QString ("Peter");     /**< Customer name value (test data). */
00013 int     gGroup   = 1;                     /**< Customer group ID value (test data). */
00014 
00015 /** Customer Constructor Test Method
00016  *  @brief This method tests the constructor of the "Customer" class.
00017  *  @author Efstathios Xatzikiriakidis
00018  */
00019 void TCustomer::testConstructor ()
00020 {
00021   Customer c (gId, gName, gSurname, gGroup);
00022 
00023   QVERIFY (c.getId ()      == gId      &&
00024            c.getName ()    == gName    &&
00025            c.getSurname () == gSurname &&
00026            c.getGroupId () == gGroup);
00027 }
